meanings: be burned[razed] to the ground, be reduced to ashes[rubbles, ruins]
start operations to burn sth to the ground
burn a jungle to the ground

vlive.korean: 초토화... Burnt to the ground. 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#148. 아이들 라디오 (w. (여자)아이들)

vlive.english: [Bursts out laughing] Wait a minute. That...

vlive.korean: [V LIVE 초토화 시키려고 기 모으는 중이었다는 게 학계의 정설] 뭐라고, 뭐라고, 뭐라고? [He was just gathering energy to explode V Live] What, what did you just say? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SEVENTEEN] 세븐틴 초토화, 두 글자면 충분합니다 🤷‍♂️부!!! 담!!!🤷‍♂️ (SEVENTEEN’s V after Manila concert)

vlive.korean: [초토화된 하우스] 나 갈래! [Total chaos] I want to go! 듣기 View video 잼플리 Jamfully : 방탄과 세븐틴의 춤을 동시에 춰본다면? [이세퀴] EP.08 #BTS #SEVENTEEN

[민석의 질문에 초토화] - O, X - 진짜 대박 - 이게 뭔 질문이지? [Minseok's question sends everyone screaming] - O, X. - Oh, my god. - What kind of a question is that? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 남녀가 술자리에서 관심을 표현하는 법 (feat. 술게임)ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스S2] EP2
vlive.english: [Minseok's question sends everyone screaming] - O, X. - Oh, my god. - What kind of a question is that?

examples.korean: War and famine bring devastation to a country. 발음듣기 전쟁과 기아는 한 국가를 초토화한다. Neungyule
examples.english: War and famine bring devastation to a country. 발음

examples.korean: One nuclear warhead of several megatons can destroy a whole city. 발음듣기 수 메카톤 급 핵탄두 한 개가 도시 전체를 초토화시킬 수 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: One nuclear warhead of several megatons can destroy a whole city. 발음

examples.korean: It takes a lot of time to decimate Taliban supply lines and to cut off their money. 발음듣기 탈리반 군의 보급로를 초토화하고 지원금을 단절시키는 것에는 시간이 많이 걸린다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It takes a lot of time to decimate Taliban supply lines and to cut off their money. 발음

examples.korean: War turned the beautiful streets into ruins. 발음듣기 아름다운 거리는 전쟁 때문에 초토화되었다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: War turned the beautiful streets into ruins. 발음

examples.korean: They dropped bombs in that area and reduced it to ashes. 발음듣기 그들은 폭탄을 투하해 그 지역을 초토화시켰다 Neungyule
examples.english: They dropped bombs in that area and reduced it to ashes. 발음
